alert.note: Alert for Coos; Grafton (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 20 at 12:39PM EST until December 21 at 5:00AM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Vermont...New Hampshire... Connecticut River Near Dalton affecting Coos, Caledonia, Grafton and Essex Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE TONIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Connecticut River near Dalton. * WHEN...Until late tonight. * IMPACTS...At 17.0 feet, Minor lowland flooding begins. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 12:15 PM EST Wednesday the stage was 17.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected remain at minor flood stage late this evening and then slowly fall below minor flood stage by Saturday morning. - Flood stage is 17.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/gray.
